name: react-native-modest-app-link
description: Link to other app with Play Store/App Store fallback

scripts.pretest: npm run format && npm run lint:fix
scripts.release: npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push --tags && npm publish

author: tiaanduplessis <tiaanduplessis@hotmail.com>
